descriptionHtml:
I made some simple harnesses but try as I might I cannot get them to work with the weight slider, and as I have just started a new job it doesn\'t look like I\'ll have time to learn how.

So I thought I would make these models available to anyone who does want to put the time into adding some sexy sexy harnesses to the world of Skyrim.

I am uploading a 3ds file with all 3 harnesses in it.  The have been unwrapped. And Fitted for CBBE V3.

Please enjoy these models and have fun.  I can\'t wait to see what the community does with them.

If you want to change the models at all.

I should also say that each harness in the 3DS File are one mesh, that is 3 harnesses = 3 meshes, should be obvious once you open the file.  I do all my modeling in Maya and export obj\'s to 3DS to prep the Nif.  If you would like or need a version of the model were the straps and rings are distinct meshes send me a message and I\'ll see what I can provide.

Also, why not.  I love to model. importing into Skyrim is fun, but I love to model.  If you have some image reference for a harness or something similar and would like someone to take a crack at modeling it let me know.

Props to Nikitaa for the Dark Lilith armor.

Thanks Caliente, I mean it. Thank you so much.
author: Armspree
